text: Astridia is a genus of plants in the family Aizoaceae. It is named after the wife Astrid of the German botanist and archaeologist Gustav Schwantes (1881 - 1960).Genaust, Helmut (1976). Etymologisches Wörterbuch der botanischen Pflanzennamen Species include: * Astridia dinteri L.Bolus * Astridia hallii L.Bolus ==References== Category:Aizoaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Astridia
